SELECT messageId,messageType,messageTypeStr,count(*) messageCount from ( select apply_id as messageId,1 as messageType,'申请'as messageTypeStr from apply_info where state!='S002' and journey_id in (select journey_id from order_info where journey_id in (select journey_id from journey_info where user_id = #{userId}) and state!='S299') union ( select approve_result_id as messageId,2 as messageType,'审批'as messageTypeStr from apply_approve_result_info where apply_id in (select apply_id from apply_info where state!='S002' and journey_id in (select journey_id from order_info where journey_id in (select journey_id from journey_info where user_id = #{userId}) and state!='S299')) ) union ( select journey_id as messageId,3 as messageType,'行程'as messageTypeStr from journey_info where user_id = #{userId} and journey_id in (select journey_id from order_info where journey_id in (select journey_id from journey_info where user_id = #{userId}) and state!='S299') ) union ( select order_id as messageId,4 as messageType,'派车'as messageTypeStr from order_info where journey_id in (select journey_id from journey_info where user_id = #{userId}) and state!='S299' )) a group by a.messageType
